  16. #ifndef CAML_GC_STATS_H
  17. ‌#define CAML_GC_STATS_H

  19. #ifdef CAML_INTERNALS

  21. #include "domain.h"

  23. /* The Gc module provides two kind of runtime statistics:
  24.    - Heap stats: statistics about heap memory, see shared_heap.c
  25.    - Allocation stats: statistics about past allocations and collections,
  26.      see major_gc.c

  28.    To avoid synchronization costs, each domain tracks its own statistics.
  29.    We never access the "live stats" of other domains running concurrently,
  30.    only their "sampled stats", a past version of the live stats saved
  31.    at a safepoint -- during stop-the-world minor collections and
  32.    on domain termination.
  33. */

  35. ‌struct heap_stats {
  36.   intnat pool_words;
  37.   intnat pool_max_words;
  38.   intnat pool_live_words;
  39.   intnat pool_live_blocks;
  40.   intnat pool_frag_words;
  41.   intnat large_words;
  42.   intnat large_max_words;
  43.   intnat large_blocks;
  44. };

  46. /* Note: accumulating stats then removing them is not a no-op, as
  47.    accumulating updates maximum values.

  49.    For example, if pool_words and pool_max_words are initially 0,
  50.    adding 10 then removing 10 will reset pool_words to 0 but leave
  51.    pool_max_words at 10. */
  52. void caml_accum_heap_stats(struct heap_stats* acc, const struct heap_stats* s);
  53. void caml_remove_heap_stats(struct heap_stats* acc, const struct heap_stats* s);

  55. ‌struct alloc_stats {
  56.   uint64_t minor_words;
  57.   uint64_t promoted_words;
  58.   uint64_t major_words;
  59.   uint64_t forced_major_collections;
  60. };
  61. void caml_accum_alloc_stats(
  62.   struct alloc_stats* acc,
  63.   const struct alloc_stats* s);
  64. void caml_collect_alloc_stats_sample(
  65.   caml_domain_state *local,
  66.   struct alloc_stats *sample);

  68. ‌struct gc_stats {
  69.   struct alloc_stats alloc_stats;
  70.   struct heap_stats heap_stats;
  71. };

  73. void caml_orphan_alloc_stats(caml_domain_state *);

  75. /* Update the sampled stats of a domain from its live stats. */
  76. void caml_collect_gc_stats_sample(caml_domain_state *domain);

  78. /* Clear the sampled stats on domain termination. */
  79. void caml_clear_gc_stats_sample(caml_domain_state *domain);

  81. /* Compute global runtime stats.

  83.    The result is an approximation, it uses the live stats of the
  84.    current domain but the sampled stats of other domains. */
  85. void caml_compute_gc_stats(struct gc_stats* buf);

  87. #endif /* CAML_INTERNALS */

  89. #endif /* CAML_GC_STATS_H */
